        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="15261" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="15261" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.77</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="6361">6,361</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="776"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Beach Walk</b> by <b>Maison Martin Margiela</b> is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women. <b>Beach Walk</b> was launched in 2012. Beach Walk was created by Jacques Cavallier Belletrud and Marie Salamagne. Top notes are Bergamot, Lemon and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Ylang-Ylang, Coconut Milk and Heliotrope; base notes are Musk, Benzoin and Cedar. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>The house of Martin Margiela is launching a brand new collection of fragrances called Replica, as an addition to the Replica fashion line. The collection of fragrances consists of three perfumes for women named Flower Market, Beach Walk and Funfair Evening. Each of them triggers a characteristic memory and is accompanied with a cotton label describing its provenance.</p>

<p>Perfumers who were invited to participate in creation of the new collection are Jacques Cavallier and Marie Salamagne. Beach Walk opens with citruses  bergamot and lemon, and develops with pink pepper, ylang-ylang, coconut milk, musk and heliotrope.</p>

<p>The fragrances are poured into classical, simple bottles similar to those in apothecaries, while their outer carton is illustrated with a photograph reflecting the topic of each of the fragrances.</p>

<p>All three perfumes are available starting from the end of June 2012, as 100 ml eau de toilette.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume                     Coconut note may be faint or nonexistent
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">

                    </div>
                    Not a safe blind buy

                    Not unique anymore

</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="15261"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.82046435076082; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.75.jpg" style="width: 2.875rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Bergamot-75.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Bergamot</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.79939954962467; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.77.jpg" style="width: 2.775rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Lemon-77.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Lemon</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.77716431896851; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.91.jpg" style="width: 2.675rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Pink-Pepper-91.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Pink Pepper</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.24.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Ylang-Ylang-24.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Ylang-Ylang</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.138.jpg" style="width: 4.775rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Coconut-138.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Coconut Milk</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.92711643842836; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.99.jpg" style="width: 3.475rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Heliotrope-99.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Heliotrope</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.98399898399848; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.4.jpg" style="width: 3.875rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Musk-4.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Musk</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.78843493436923; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.69.jpg" style="width: 2.725rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Benzoin-69.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Benzoin</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.41.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cedar-41.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Cedar</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="15261"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='e5a5c93b381f34ae1809728284dd0587128' slotpayload='{"ct":"cWciiedmdTNJCGG5AbhPEMtXh8TKhw9M3GCv4rntgYQBssQzsyheRoMGxkQoB2HgXumVeLT84TurESLKyBTi6fhIYa3G3n+HafsTRLeWnkwT\/czZGDxC4g3BxeZy6Krli+Nc94XAZt3lgqrXVlGx3jR23oIuGixP93MU33e+xLRejBjGJd1wBLY3R7HJAzRv9NgZyoJcsAuO0vqFL8rQWxPnTb4E8YlVuT5zCxhfnV9B7CvdneESc8gXz4qy8OTj7gn3vhuG+7hQN+4OSLkd7lQsMNre2SMuLIHN2aP8T6I8KMW29QXY2xoGtPIFNr\/A","iv":"fed9571193868ca0894e058ad98647e1","s":"3719ad3a105e4b0b"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

                    </div>
    </div>

    <span class="badge">2</span>
</div>

class="brand">Versace</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">Crystal Noir</span></a></div><div class="carousel-cell"><a href="/perfume/Lancome/La-Vie-Est-Belle-14982.html"><img loading="lazy" Belle</span></a></div></div><carousel-perfumes></carousel-perfumes><span title="/perfume-finder/?p=15261" class="idLinkify"><span class="button small" style="color: white">Find more recommendations</span></span></div><div class="cell small-12" style="padding: 2px;"><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x" id="newreview" style="margin-top:30px"><div class="rw-frame"><p class="linkrg"><span title="/board/register.php" class="rtg">Become a member of this online perfume community and you will be able to add your own reviews.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="cell <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem;     <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2369088" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2369088" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Daffers28"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2311623"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Daffers28" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2369088ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2369088" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2311623">Daffers28</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-03">12/03/24 03:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im a huge fan of Miami glow by jlo. Sadly discontinued. But this fragrance by Replica is really nice and very summery it smells like the sun lotion from the 70s Ambre solair exactly! Its taken me back to those beautiful days. I live in a coastal country in the south of Europe, so yes! Love it!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2369088"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2369088#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2361339" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2361339" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sophieda"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2335267"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sophieda" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2361339ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2361339" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2335267">sophieda</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-25">11/25/24 20:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm a pretty big fan of this but there is definitely a risk of other people thinking you smell like a grandma. I have gotten that comment before while wearing this. Generally it's a nice summery scent that can elevate the vibe if you're having summer fun, but unfortunately the appropriate times for wearing it are somewhat limited.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2361339"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2361339#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2357255" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2357255" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wizardmon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1961246"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1961246.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wizardmon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2357255ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2357255" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1961246">Wizardmon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-22">11/22/24 01:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>You know like when you're a child and you imagine what "adult" perfumes are like? This smells like that exactly. It doesn't have any of the tropical notes (like coconut). It just has a very generic this-is-perfume scent, like a stock smell. It gives me grandma vibes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2357255"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2357255#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2351902" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2351902" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rachael0304"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2319124"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2319124.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rachael0304" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2351902ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2351902" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2319124">Rachael0304</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-17">11/17/24 07:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The characteristics of a beach day in a fragrance without being too literal. Beautiful and well blended. Gives the impression of a serene eastern shore instead of a tropical location.  It reminds me of walking on a beach in the Outer Banks in North Carolina in the evening. I do agree with the other reviewers that there are limited occasions when this would be appropriate to wear. It has a slightly powdery opening which I enjoyed. The yellow ylang-ylang and the white heliotrope are smooth and stand out the most to me. I appreciate that this does not smell like sunscreen. The projection was intimate and longevity was a big issue for me. I tested this multiple times and could not get it to last more than 3 hours.  My overall rating is 6/10. I enjoy this very much and I love how this scent really connects me to positive memories of beach days.  But the performance is really disappointing and there are limited occasions to wear and I do think it is not the best value for what you are purchasing. Next summer I will be trying to find a dupe instead of buying the full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2351902"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2351902#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2350191" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2350191" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sprasava"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1551296"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1551296.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sprasava" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Atelier-Cologne/Clementine-California-42249.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42249.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Clmentine California"title="Clmentine California"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2350191ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2350191" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1551296">sprasava</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-15">11/15/24 13:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I didn't get a lot of coconut from this. I generally like the scent. However, the sunscreen smell is too powerful for me, it conceals the other notes, and it really restricts the time of year I feel like I can wear this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2350191"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2350191#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2342704" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2342704" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Atomicopossum"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2279735"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Atomicopossum" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15261.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Beach Walk"title="Beach Walk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2342704ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2342704" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2279735">Atomicopossum</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-08">11/08/24 20:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Strong oceanic vibes, immediately felt like I was at a beach house. Very nice for a day-time summer fragrance. Would likely be nice during dinner time as well if youre outside.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2342704"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2342704#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2341930" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2341930" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FunkyUncleEdward"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1566376"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1566376.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FunkyUncleEdward" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marissa-Zappas/Flaming-Creature-71849.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71849.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Flaming Creature"title="Flaming Creature"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2341930ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2341930" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1566376">FunkyUncleEdward</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-08">11/08/24 06:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my all time favorites. It smells true to the description: salty and sun kissed, with some light florals and woods. I feel happy whenever I wear it. For me, projection and longevity are among the best in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2341930"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2341930#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2340016" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is sweet and floral and smooth, but something about it is a bit nauseating to me. I think it's the heliotrope that throws it off for me, it is a note I often have trouble with. It did linger a looong time on my arm though. Definitely summery</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2340016"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2340016#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2338768" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2325063" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ca.ritchie41"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213354"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2213354.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ca.ritchie41" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lorenzo-Pazzaglia/Sugar-Kisses-88326.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88326.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sugar Kisses"title="Sugar Kisses"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2325063ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2325063" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213354">ca.ritchie41</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-23">10/23/24 10:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this perfume but its identical to one Avon used to make for 5 which I still have! So like all Maison Margiela scents its way overpriced. I do love it though and have bought a full size bottle. Its definitely one of my favourite perfumes for summer. It smells like suntan cream and holidays to the Caribbean, sitting on the beach till sun down, listening to the clear blue waves and sipping rum punch. Brings back lots of memories for me. This for me is definitely one of the best scents from Maison Margiela along with Matcha Meditation.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2325063"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2325063#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2319744" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2319744" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="calighrebhi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2264669"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="calighrebhi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hilde-Soliani/Miss-Tranchant-31756.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31756.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Miss Tranchant"title="Miss Tranchant"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2319744ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2319744" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2264669">calighrebhi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-18">10/18/24 08:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is what I texted my friend after testing this perfume:<br />
<br />
Beach walk smells like hot girls at the beach. Like they did their hair and make up to go to the beach. Santa Monica girls.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2319744"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2319744#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2319090" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2318999" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mmiamuse"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1853752"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1853752.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mmiamuse" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/BDK-Parfums/Gris-Charnel-57038.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57038.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gris Charnel"title="Gris Charnel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2318999ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2318999" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1853752">mmiamuse</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-17">10/17/24 13:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is definitely a summer fragrance. I love this! I was wearing it non-stop when i got it a few months ago. To me, this smells like coconut, citrus, and vanilla. The lasting power could be better but for finding this at Ross for a really good price, I am more than happy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2318999"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2318999#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2317804" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2317804" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lazulisylph"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1883751"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1883751.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lazulisylph" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Lilyphea-96740.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96740.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lilypha"title="Lilypha"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2317804ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2317804" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1883751">lazulisylph</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-16">10/16/24 12:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ephemeral floral note at the opening, then it quickly turns into a sweet gourmand that is creamy and milky in a way that reminds me of the Chinese white rabbit milk candy. Not a plus as a lover of florals, and I find that there is even a synthetic, slightly headache-inducing quality to it. I took a deeper sniff and realised that the synthetic quality that I had detected was likely that of sunscreen. <br />
<br />
Overall, Beach Walk is pretty darn underwhelming; I'd expected more based on some of the reactions I've seen, but then again, I dont think Ive ever been particularly impressed by any of the fragrances Ive smelled from the Replica line so far.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2284380">michellesnapple</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-12">10/12/24 19:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>when i first tried this on in store, i absolutely loved this perfume. it was light, fresh, and slightly coconut-y. i bought a travel size a couple months later because i kept thinking about. now that ive worn it a few times, im not so sure i like it anymore. i dont know if the fragrance just needs to sit on the shelf for a while, but now whenever i put it on, its overwhelmingly white floral, sunscreen-y and slightly musky. im not the biggest fan of musky scents, so i dont think ill end up buying a bigger bottle. not going to be wearing this for while as its more of a spring/summer scent, but will use up what i have and eventually move on to other fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I think the scent can only be worn on summer days and it's not suitable for work/office environments.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2298922"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2298922#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2294671" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2294671" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jambu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1474763"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1474763.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jambu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2294671ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2294671" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1474763">jambu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-25">09/25/24 09:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sunscreen-y and coconut-y type scent. This was one of the first few fragrances I've ever bought and at first I loved it, but as I dive deeper into the fragrance rabbit hole I didn't like it as much. It's still good though, I'd actually wear this if I go to the beach. It's a good summer scent with mediocre performance. Don't get this as an office type scent, I don't think it'll fit</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2294671"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2294671#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2287724" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2287724" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nicholassua"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/11042"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.11042.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nicholassua" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Uomo-19558.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.19558.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Uomo"title="Valentino Uomo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2287724ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2287724" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/11042">nicholassua</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-19">09/19/24 01:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>overly hyped<br />
gave me nauseat</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2287724"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2287724#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2286915" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2286915" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kaleidoscopeeyes1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073952"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kaleidoscopeeyes1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2286915ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2286915" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073952">kaleidoscopeeyes1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-18">09/18/24 08:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I first tried this out in the store, I fell in love with it and purchased it. Now that I've used it in the summer, while I still like it, I don't love it like I used to. First of all, it's not the type of summer fragrance that is very light and fresh; I can even say that it comes off as a bit mature. It is heavily floral, I can hardly make out the other notes like coconut and citrus. Overall, if someone was to ask me what this fragrance reminded me of without showing its label, I wouldn't think of the beach, but a garden with lots of flowers.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2286915"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2286915#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2281978" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2281978" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="qgbpmk12"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2235780"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="qgbpmk12" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Loewe/Loewe-001-Woman-40790.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40790.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Loewe 001 Woman"title="Loewe 001 Woman"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2281978ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2281978" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2235780">qgbpmk12</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-13">09/13/24 17:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For me it is a very mature take on a sweet perfume. I've never been really interested in sweet fragrances to be honest, but since my latest obsession with beach fragrances, I've surrender to these notes that remind me of a hot summer day at the beach. The sweetness is the first thing I notice, no other notes comes to me as hard as the coconut and musk, but in this very sexy way. It has a bit of a chemical smell tho, until it dries down it has a bit of a hard feel on the nose, if I spray too much I get a bit nauseous. I feel like on my skin it mutes very quickly but other people always comment on the smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2281978"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2281978#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2280291" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2280291" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kaleidosaur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1162988"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1162988.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kaleidosaur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maya-Njie/Nordic-Cedar-63294.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.63294.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nordic Cedar"title="Nordic Cedar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2280291ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2280291" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); This smells like a scented eraser from the early 2000s. I actually find it very nostalgic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2280291"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2280291#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2277580" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2277580" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amberaddict"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2133221"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="amberaddict" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Costa-Azzurra-64617.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64617.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Costa Azzurra"title="Costa Azzurra"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2277580ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2277580" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2133221">amberaddict</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-09">09/09/24 21:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Super realistic, literally smells like the beach.<br />
<br />
Just can't shake the connotation between the beach and sand getting stuck in my shoes though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2277580"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2277580#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2275801" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2275801" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JuliaToothFairy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026472"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2026472.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JuliaToothFairy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2275801ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2275801" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2026472">JuliaToothFairy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-08">09/08/24 08:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When you first spray it, you smell citrus (bergamot, lemon) and a light sweet coconut water. The vibe of this perfume reminds me of Bubble Bath by Replica, because that perfume combines as well, fresh and sweet notes.<br />
I was excited to experiment this perfume because many people say that it smells like sunscreen, but unfortunately, it doesn't smell at all like sunscreen to me.<br />
After it dries down, you're left with a citrus smell (bergamot), a bit of spicy pepper and something moldy? Moldy rotten mango/kiwi smell, exactly like the one in Sailing Day and Under the Lemon Tree.<br />
The longevity is very poor... I sprayed 5 times only on my wrist and clothes, in 2 hours the perfume was gone.<br />
As a scent, it's nothing original or unique.<br />
Overall, I was pretty disappointed with this perfume because it didn't smell like sunscreen, beach day, vacation by the sea, suntanning or the ocean's breeze to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2275801"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2275801#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2274578" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2274578" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Demani"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2246156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2246156.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Demani" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2274578ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2274578" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2246156">Demani</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-07">09/07/24 08:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells very much like the name<br />
Very summery warm<br />
A lot of creamy coconut, reminding me of coconut milk<br />
I can smell the little golden sand particles that are warm form the sun and I am walking on them and feeling the warmth in my feet<br />
There are notes that smell like sunscreen (I hate the scent of sunnscreen) but it smells great in this combination</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2274578"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2274578#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2270846" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2270846" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mindzy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1144687"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1144687.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mindzy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-7-Virtues/Cherry-Ambition-87203.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87203.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cherry Ambition"title="Cherry Ambition"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2270846ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2270846" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1144687">mindzy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-04">09/04/24 00:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you're in search of a scent that captures the carefree essence of a beach vacation, consider the Replica Beach Walk perfume. It has a light, salty sea breeze aroma that reminds me of being at the beach in the afternoon, with a lingering hint of suntan lotion on the skin. The combination of delicate citrusy and soft floral notes produces a well-balanced and inviting fragrance. Its unique and nostalgic aroma makes it perfect for casual outings or daytime wear. I've found that it has impressive longevity on my skin, and the subtle sweetness lasts throughout the day. Beach Walk offers a delightful choice for a relaxed and nostalgic olfactory experience. It shares similarities with Tom Ford's Soleil Blanc, but Beach Walk is lighter and less creamy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2270846"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2270846#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2261419" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2261419" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragrance_fan24"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2231561"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2231561.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragrance_fan24" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Bubble-Bath-60105.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60105.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bubble Bath"title="Bubble Bath"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2261419ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2261419" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); My first impression was of the kind of scent on children's stationary. It smells nothing like the beach unless it's meant to smell like an artificial beach filled with holidayers and small children covered in fruity smelling sun screen. It's not natural at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2261419"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2261419#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2261259" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2261259" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="adriennb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1928079"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1928079.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="adriennb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Delina-La-Rosee-64667.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64667.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Delina La Rose"title="Delina La Rose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2261259ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2261259" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1928079">adriennb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-26">08/26/24 03:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very nice floral scent. I don't really smell much coconut, just pure florals, but it's pleasant and clean. Because of the lack of coconut it doesn't really smell like sunscreen to me. It reminds me more of a walk along the beach in spring, when it's already warm but not crazy hot and the flowers are just blooming. That being said it would work as a summer vacation beachy scent. Definitely good for warmer weather. The performance is not the best but unfortunately that's the case with most Maison Margiela scents for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2261259"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2261259#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2261157" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Call me biased, but I think Vacation solos this fragrance and for a fraction of the price. I understand they vary slightly in mood and occasion, but I can't justify buying it when Beach Walk is competing with other heavy hitters in the genre. <br />
<br />
Overall, it's not a bad fragrance though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2254174"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2254174#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2252615" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2252615"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2252615#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2247539" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
