align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2247539"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2247539#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241683" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2241683" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sananda@37"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847010"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1847010.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sananda@37" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Scarlet-Poppy-Cologne-Intense-79435.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79435.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Scarlet Poppy Cologne Intense"title="Scarlet Poppy Cologne Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2241683ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2241683" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847010">Sananda@37</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-07">08/07/24 08:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I never imagined that in such a short span of time I would end up finding a close relative of Guerlain Nettare di Sole. They got some good similarities with each other. Both are supposedly scents reminiscent of a sunny day. Take a look at their main accords and you will understand and I can't shirk the feeling that this too has that similar kind of saltiness thats present in nettare di sole. I immensely like Nettare di Sole which i find more floral. All in all beach walk is good. So what if it reminds you of sun tan lotion? Isn't that good in a way. I am enjoying it. Hope you do too. Hope it makes you feel good. Got a 30 ml today.<br />
Poor longevity though. Lasts only about 2 hrs. All the perfumes from this line suffer from this aspect. No matter how intense it appears at the beginning it hardly lasts beyond 2hrs. Bad pricing for a designer eau de Toilette. If you find it at anywhere at 30% discount or more buy a small 30ml first.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2241683"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2241683#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2241298" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2241298" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="azzamut900"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2214873"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="azzamut900" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2241298ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2241298" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2214873">azzamut900</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-06">08/06/24 21:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It really does smell like a beach day and puts a smile on my face and brings back good memories. It smells like a pleasant suncreen, so I personally wouldn't wear it but I do enjoy what its going for.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2241298"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2241298#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239676" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I have a travel size and wont be buying a full-size.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2239676"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2239676#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2238957" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Funny thing is i dont even like beachy scents anymore</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2238957"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2238957#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2237980" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1946935">Briannapremium</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-03">08/03/24 15:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If youre as chronically online as I am and you remember the coconut girl aesthetic that was briefly popular in 2020- this is that. A good balance between a sophisticated perfume and a coconut gourmand. Unlike a lot of other coconut fragrances Ive smelled, it doesnt smell cheap or like a body spray.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2237980"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2237980#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2236284" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2235141" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="venusiangel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2208518"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2208518.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="venusiangel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-Paradoxe-Intense-83988.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83988.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada Paradoxe Intense"title="Prada Paradoxe Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2235141ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2235141" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2208518">venusiangel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-31">07/31/24 18:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am a bergamot devotee and have a newfound love for pink pepper in perfumes, but I can't say I caught either notes in this perfume. I think it becomes more agreeable with time as well. I originally thought it was kinda playdoh-like after the initial spray but then when we got back to the car from the store (30 minutes later) i smelled the tanning lotion and sunscreen sweetness properly. It must be the coconut. Very solar and accurate to the name which I really admire of it, the artistic direction of this replica line is endearing to me truly, but I can't say it's worth the price unless you're a huge fan of that tanning lotion sweetness. Airy and fresh and really likeable definitely summer-y but probably not a safe blind buy for all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2235141"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2235141#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2234360" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1328392">Kathy Reed</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-30">07/30/24 23:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I feel like this smells like a church :( I really wanted to love this the notes seemed so inoffensive but I got hit with heavy woods and a church smell</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2234360"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2234360#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2232952" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2232952" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ke3ke3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2101926"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2101926.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ke3ke3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Crivelli/Iris-Malikhan-62617.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62617.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Iris Malikhn"title="Iris Malikhn"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2232952ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2232952" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2101926">ke3ke3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-29">07/29/24 13:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have been SLEEPING on this fragrance!! This... is an eye roller... my eyes have rolled so far back into my head with pleasure that I'm not sure they'll ever return! WOW. To me, my nose, and my associations... this INSTANTLY transported me to my trips to Hawaii. It smells just like a gorgeous Hawaiian lei.. imaging myself with my lei, my swimsuit, and my lover strolling casually along the beach as the sun starts to settle into dusk. My gosh, it's just so lovely!!! I'm a ylang ylang lover, so I'm not sure if I can justify bringing this into my collection... BUT, justification or not, a full bottle will be making it's way to me! My go-to fragrance in this same vein is Ylang Ylang Nosy Be by Perris Monte Carlo... and while I do LOVE that fragrance, there's something about Beach Walk that just feels... perhaps, light and airy?? More fun, playful, and easy going. Ylang Ylang Nosy Be is like the rich aunt, and Beach Walk is the etherial niece!<br />
<br />
I noticed some comparison to Rio Radiance (I forget what # they assigned to it)... and I have to, respectfully, disagree!! I have a fervant distain for Rio Radiance, but Beach Walk... I could bathe in!! To me, it doesn't smell like sunscreen. I guess the sunscreens I'm used to have quite pungent UV filters, typically concealed (attempted to be concealed) by a strong coconut. This... this, for me, is a Hawaiian lei in a bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2232952"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2232952#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2228991" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2228991" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="curlycomedy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2014858"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2014858.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="curlycomedy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Khamrah-75805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Khamrah"title="Khamrah"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2228991ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2228991" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2014858">curlycomedy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-25">07/25/24 08:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I want to break up my heavy scent patterns without being too floral I reach for Beach Walk. I love the imagery the name evokes.  This fragrance smells fresh and makes me feel clean and new. It is light and reminds me more of fresh salty sea air and clean laundry than an ocean. Nothing traditionally aquatic about it, but in the dry-down I get a bit of wet dog (but your dog you just gave a bath, not a dirty dog who ran through the rain). I also like that the florals hide. That may be the laundry element to me. Definitely feels right for summer. It doesnt wow me, but I never sniff it and think, Meh, I think, Mmm. Nice. I am a gourmand lover (linear and complex), and I gravitate more towards cozy winter scents like By the Fireplace or Jazz Club, so the only thing that would make me go through this faster is if it had better projection, sillage, and longevity. For now I use it as a palate-cleanser.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2228991"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2228991#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2228376" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Perfect</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2228376"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2228376#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2226029" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I actually really like this. Cant tell if anyone needs to buy it or if you can achieve the same effect by just wearing a coconut-scented sunscreen. Would pair well with Hawaiian Tropic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2226029"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2226029#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2224526" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I heard good things so I kept wearing it hoping it would grow on me. I ALWAYS got compliments on it whenever I wore it. But I wore it on a mini hike by a river and bugs were very attracted to this scent. I ended up giving it to my mom.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2224526"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2224526#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2222560" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2222560" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Verrucosa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324123"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1324123.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Verrucosa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Philosykos-Eau-de-Parfum-3865.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3865.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Philosykos Eau de Parfum"title="Philosykos Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2222560ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2222560" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324123">Verrucosa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-18">07/18/24 13:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love beachy, basic sunscreen perfumes but of all the big names in this genre, this might be my least favourite. At first the heliotrope takes over and makes it overwhelmingly powdery on me. It does mellow out eventually and turns into more of a ylang-coconut-musk sunscreeny cocktail but there's something a bit sharp and piercing in it that I can't warm to. I keep trying it because it really should be right up my alley but I always want to scrub it off. And somehow, despite its reputation for not lasting, I can never get rid of it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2222560"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2222560#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2218095" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2218095" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tinkerbelle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2147661"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2147661.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tinkerbelle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nateeva/Dominican-Republic-45297.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45297.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dominican Republic"title="Dominican Republic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2218095ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2218095" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2147661">Tinkerbelle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-14">07/14/24 00:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought a sample of Beach Walk and only expected to like it, but I honestly love it and can't get enough of it. Not sure how, without any kind of salt accords or water notes, they made it actually smell like I'm spending a beautiful sunny day in the fragrant fresh air of a walk on the beach, but it takes me there. Definitely a freshie. Nice and clean, rather than sweet. I ordered a travel spray. This fragrance makes me feel like I'm walking on sunshine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2218095"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2218095#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2216158" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This perfume is the perfect summer scent. I think it encapsulates the sweet floral smell that fills the air on holiday, as well as a lovely nostalgia of the coconutty musk of suncream. I wear it a lot and often get compliments.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2216158"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2216158#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215369" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2157300">Cologne_lover0310</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-11">07/11/24 10:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells like sunscreen</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Well, i loved the fragrance in the bottle but when i put it on i thought it dried down to a completely different scent, more powdery.  But then I left it for a little longer and the scent came to life.  Definitely pick up on the musk and cedar base but the coconut and heliotrope keep the summer feeling afloat.  I've been enchanted by this all day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2214424"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2214424#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2213969" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2211377" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="katieneedsthat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713186"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="katieneedsthat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2211377ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2211377" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1713186">katieneedsthat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-07">07/07/24 19:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love it. It lasts forever on your clothes, I smelled it at least 8 hours later on my jacket after the initial spray. At first i thought it smelled beachy, then I didn't, now I'm back to thinking its beachy again. So beachy or not, it smells great and lasts a long time on clothes.<br />
<br />
edit; i bought Sol De Janiero Cheirosa 87 Rio Radiance and they smell similar. I think its the ylang ylang. Both are beachy and good summer scents. The Rio Radiance turns into a skin scent within 1.5 hours I'd say, but the Beachwalk is "sharper" and lasts longer. I think they'd be good to wear together. The Rio Radiance is sweeter and can help counteract the "sharpness" of the Beachwalk</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2211377"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2211377#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2209707" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2201761" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hanavrose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2179426"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="hanavrose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Carnal-Flower-1024.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1024.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Carnal Flower"title="Carnal Flower"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2201761ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2201761" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2179426">hanavrose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-28">06/28/24 02:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Don't get any beach scent from this. Instead, i get pure talcum power, there is something synthetic and metallic about it and like with the majority of Maison Margiela fragrances, there is one prominent note that comes through and completely hijacks the entire fragrance. Fortunately a sample was included with the purchase so once i realised the fragrance was not for me i was able to return unopened and unused. Not a safe blind buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2201761"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2201761#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2201293" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2201293" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Trench1419!"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2169860"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2169860.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Trench1419!" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Myriad-85363.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85363.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Myriad"title="Myriad"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2201293ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2201293" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2169860">Trench1419!</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-27">06/27/24 13:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this Beach Walk Replica fragrance!  I just got it from Amazon last week, but I just love the refreshing, salty beach scent!  I've been wearing it lately, and it's been really cheering me up.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2201293"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2201293#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2201265" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2201265" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aeternitas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/603"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.603.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aeternitas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hanae-Mori/Magical-Moon-1578.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1578.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Magical Moon"title="Magical Moon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2201265ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2201265" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/603">Aeternitas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-27">06/27/24 13:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beach Walk has an ozonic quality, heavy on the ylang-ylang, a touch of sunscreen, sunshine, feet in the sand with a coconut stand nearby, and a bar serving tropical drinks. This is one of the longest lasting ones I've tried from Maison Margiela. Not my thing, but if you're looking for casual beach party vibes, it's this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2201265"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2201265#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2199644" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2199644" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kikibonini"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1906770"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1906770.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kikibonini" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-7-Virtues/Vanilla-Woods-52560.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52560.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Woods"title="Vanilla Woods"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2199644ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2199644" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1906770">kikibonini</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-25">06/25/24 21:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Extremely pleasant, and like the epitome of summer! I definitely get a huge sunscreen note that many others have mentioned, which is personally a huge nostalgia trigger scent for me that makes me highly drawn to this fragrance. It truly is a beach day in a bottle :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2199644"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2199644#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2196448" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2196448" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rene.saller"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1269044"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1269044.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rene.saller" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Idole-L-Intense-62333.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62333.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Idle L'Intense"title="Idle L'Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2196448ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2196448" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1269044">rene.saller</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-22">06/22/24 15:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like this just fine on the tester strip, and I get that it's an EDT, but it's exceedingly light and subtle. A woody, salty, mildly ozonic floral freshie, it reminds me of a Jennifer Aniston scent that I like, Near Dusk, with maybe a dash of Chapter One. For the price, however, I do not think Beach Walk, pretty as it is, holds up. I like the salty florals and faint coconut, but it's not quite loud enough for me. I would recommend this to people who want a subtler beachy fragrance. I haven't tried it on skin yet, but I can tell from the tester strip that it would need to be sprayed liberally, if not wantonly, to be perceived by anyone outside a two-foot scent bubble. Either that or I'm noseblind to whatever musks they're using, which is possible. I will probably use up my travel sprayer and never buy a full bottle because there are less expensive options with better throw and performance, at least for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2196448"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2196448#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2195739" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2195739" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Stararmour"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/71975"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.71975.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Stararmour" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Miss-Dior-Eau-de-Parfum-2021-68905.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68905.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Miss Dior Eau de Parfum (2021)"title="Miss Dior Eau de Parfum (2021)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2195739ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2195739" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/71975">Stararmour</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-21">06/21/24 22:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I sampled this at the Singapore airport a few months ago but didn't buy it. I've had a recent spate of buying expensive perfumes that I thought I liked but ended up leaving on shelf duty. So, I told myself nope. But I loved the scent when I sprayed it. It just is so different from anything I own. Made me think of holidays and savory/sweet treats. Smells to me like a creamy salty tang on skin - with a hint of a floral and warm scent.<br />
<br />
I sprayed it on my wrist that airport transit and could still smell it when I got home 5-6 hours later and I still loved it. <br />
<br />
Skip to a few more trips later and I finally caved and got the 100ml - have been wearing it non stop for the last few days - just takes a few sprays after shower and it hangs around for a good 8-10 hours on me. No clue where the comments about it not lasting are from!!  <br />
<br />
I think this might become one of my staples right after narciso for her and Elizabeth arden green tea (which reallly doesn't last AT ALL)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2195739"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2195739#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2193717" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2193717" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marshallmiller23!"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705240"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1705240.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marshallmiller23!" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2193717ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2193717" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705240">Marshallmiller23!</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-19">06/19/24 21:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance has grown on me. First sniff I thought' Nope, don't like it'.. It has been sitting in my collection of travel sprays for a year. What opened my eyes or nose was, I purchased a travel of Alien Goddess and for the life of me it was intriguing and reminded me of something I smelled. Then it hit me, Beach Walk. My nose had to mature to appreciate this coconut, slightly sunscreeny, creamy scent.<br />
<br />
The ylang-ylang gives a sweet creaminess along with the coconut milk and the combination of the two is where I feel the sunscreen note is coming from. The heliotrope and benzoin gives a slight vanilla effect.  I pick up no citrus notes at all. It dries down musky and floral. Mild longevity and sillage. You will need to overspray and travel with a decant to top off.<br />
<br />
Great easy reach summertime scent. If you like similar scent profiles like Alien Goddess or Guerlain Terracotta. You will like Beach Walk.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="15261"comment_id="2193717"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Beach-Walk-15261.html?ccid=2193717#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2193349" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2193349" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Frandeforce"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2170698"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Frandeforce" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2193349ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2193349" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);
